title: Yokubou no Shizuku
description:
1-4) Droplets of Desire
"I'll drown you in ecstasy--" promised the dangerously charismatic and sexy infirmary doctor, Kokuyo, as he took Yuzuru's body! Unable to resist or escape, Yuzuru thought he's afraid of Kokuyo... until he was embraced by him… To Yuzuru's surprise, it reminded him of the affection he used to experienced as a child...!?

5) Droplets of Desire
About Shirogane and Okamoto

6) Shirogane x Okamoto JEALOUSY

7) Shirogane x Okamoto PROPOSAL

8) Epilogue
